survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of co-working spaces to understand their satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement in services and amenities.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a co-working space?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment users by frequency of usage for further analysis.

script.question_text: How often do you use a co-working space?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use a co-working space? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Access to office amenities (e.g., printers, meeting rooms)
Cost-effective compared to traditional office space
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key motivators for using co-working spaces.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox selection; multi-choice question with an 'Other' option for open text.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use a co-working space? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Access to office amenities (e.g., printers, meeting rooms)
Cost-effective compared to traditional office space

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction with cleanliness and maintenance.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the co-working space?

questions.question_text: What additional amenities or services would you like to see offered in your co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on desired improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Open text field; respondents can type their answers.

script.question_text: What additional amenities or services would you like to see offered in your co-working space?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this co-working space to a colleague or friend?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to gauge overall satisfaction and likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this co-working space to a colleague or friend?
